doc.title: Canon ieat Photography Workshop for Teachers of Dunman Secondary School
doc.text: When/WRB I/PRP was/VBD in/IN school/NN ,/, IT/NN was/VBD n't/RB even/RB a/DT subject/NN ./. Now/RB it/PRP is/VBZ an/DT indispensable/JJ part/NN of/IN the/DT curriculum/NN ./. But/CC teachers/JJ themselves/NN might/VBD not/RB be/VB IT/JJ savvy/NN ,/, so/RB how/RB to/TO teach/VB the/DT subject/NN to/TO students/VB ,/, many/JJ of/IN whom/NNS are/VBP already/RB blogging/VBG and/CC online/NNP gaming/NNP ?/. As/IN part/NN of/IN an/DT effort/NN to/TO inspire/VB the/DT teachers/NN ,/, the/DT IT/NN dept/NN invited/VBD me/PRP to/TO conduct/VB a/DT lecture/NN and/CC workshop/NN on/IN Blogging/NN and/CC Food/NN Photography/NN ./. Around/JJ twenty/NN teachers/NN were/VBD in/IN attendance/NN and/CC after/IN the/DT lecture/NN ,/, everyone/PRP got/VBD an/DT opportunity/NN to/TO take/VB some/DT photos/NNS of/IN the/DT Sushi/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ interesting/JJ to/TO note/VB that/IN the/DT Sushi/NN was/VBD eaten/VBN by/IN some/DT other/JJ teachers/NN who/WP came/VBD after/IN the/DT workshop/NN and/CC that/WDT none/NN of/IN the/DT teachers/NN who/WP took/VBD the/DT photos/NNS actually/RB ate/VBD the/DT Sushi/NN .../: ./.
